WorkItem.ClosedComment: This bug was fixed in release 0.2.
WorkItem.Description:
When using multiple ChartPlotters in the same stackpanel,  the right click-> Copy picture will copy a black rectangle to the clipboard if used on the second or later ChartPlotters.
Â 
Workaround:  Create a Border for each ChartPlotter and make the ChartPlotter the child of the border.  Add the borders to the StackPanel.  After doing this,  each ChartPlotter copies correctly to the clipboard.
WorkItem.Summary: Copy Picture To Clipboard produces black square

Comments.Message:
This bug was fixed in release 0.2 [release:20298].
But also release 0.2 introduced a peculiarity of Plotter's behavior - if it is added to StackPanel, it should have a width or height set explicitly (property to set depends on StackPanel's orientation).
If Plotter is added to grid, it is not necessary to set width or height.
